item.title: My yell command
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

It’s been awhile since I’ve coded a private server, but try this.

/*
 * Written by jwasgs ( I hope)
 * Cleaned/fixed by Anfernio
*/

if(command.startsWith("yell")) {
	String rank = "";

if (playerRights >= 0) {
rank =  "@bla@[Player] ["+playerName+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 3) {
rank =   "@red@[Owner] ["+playerName+]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 4) {
rank =   "@bla@[Player] ["+playerName+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 2) {
rank =  "@gre@[Admin] ["+playerName+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 1) {
rank =   "@yel@[Moderator] ["+playerName+"]:";
}
yell(rank +playerName+": " + command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic

item.title: My yell command
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

i got my yell command to work, its a 317 server

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {

                           String

Title = “[Player]”;
if (playerRights == 3)
Title = "[Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 4)

Title = "[Co-Owner] ";
if (playerRights == 2)

Title = "[Admin] ";
if (playerRights == 1)

Title = "[Moderator] ";
yell(Title + playerName

  • ": " + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

i tried to add colors, and when i used this code

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {

                String rank = "";

if (playerRights >= 0) {
rank =

“@bla@[Player]@bla@[”+ playerName

+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 3) {
rank =

“@red@[owner]@blu@[”+ playerName

+]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 4) {
rank =

“@bla@[Player]@bla@[”+ playerName

+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 2) {
rank =

“@gre@[Admin]@bla@[”+ playerName

+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 1) {
rank =

“@yel@[Moderator]@bla@[”+ playerName

+"]:";
}
yell(rank + playerName

  • ": " + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

but when i did command i saw “@yel@[Moderator]@bla@[my name]:”, so i tried to fix by adding this

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {

                String rank = "";

if (playerRights >= 0) {
rank = "

“+@bla@+”[Player]"+@bla@+"["+

playerName +"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 3) {
rank = "

“+@red@+”[owner]"+@blu@+"["+ playerName

+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 4) {
rank = "

“+@bla@+”[Player]"+@bla@+"["+

playerName +"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 2) {
rank = "

“+@gre@+”[Admin]"+@bla@+"["+ playerName

+"]:";
}
if (playerRights >= 1) {
rank = "

“+@yel@+”[Moderator]"+@bla@+"["+

playerName +"]:";
}
yell(rank + playerName

  • ": " + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

but i got 50 errors, basically the errors said we need identifyers at +, or a + is not a statement, or we need ; before pluses. weird.
plz help! thanks!!
